content:
downloaded the current version of the IG publisher few minutes ago. A new error

error : C:\PQCMC_IG\input\vocabulary\valueset\Dosage.json (The system cannot find the path specified)

This is an XML only implementation

    <parameter>
        <code value="excludejson"/>
        <value value="true"/>
    </parameter>

Never needed a json valuesets before. Is there another code to suppress it?
The problem was an incorrect reference value in the spreadsheet column. Just an odd error message. Suppose if it does not find XML it decides it must be in json format.
hmm I'll see if I can reproduce so I can make the message better
